b3d.chisight.particle_system 

  1import genjax
  2import jax
  3import jax.numpy as jnp
  4from genjax import gen
  5
  6import b3d
  7from b3d import Mesh, Pose
  8from b3d.chisight.sparse.gps_utils import add_dummy_var
  9from b3d.pose import uniform_pose_in_ball
 10
 11dummy_mapped_uniform_pose = add_dummy_var(uniform_pose_in_ball).vmap(
 12    in_axes=(0, None, None, None)
 13)
 14
 15
 16uniform_pose_args = (Pose.identity(), 2.0, 0.5)
 17
 18
 19@gen
 20def initial_particle_system_state(
 21    num_particles,
 22    num_clusters,
 23    relative_particle_poses_prior_params,
 24    initial_object_poses_prior_params,
 25    camera_pose_prior_params,
 26):
 27    relative_particle_poses = (
 28        dummy_mapped_uniform_pose(
 29            jnp.arange(num_particles.const), *relative_particle_poses_prior_params
 30        )
 31        @ "particle_poses"
 32    )
 33
 34    object_assignments = (
 35        b3d.modeling_utils.categorical.vmap(in_axes=(0,))(
 36            jnp.zeros((num_particles.const, num_clusters.const))
 37        )
 38        @ "object_assignments"
 39    )
 40
 41    # Cluster pose in world coordinates
 42    initial_object_poses = (
 43        dummy_mapped_uniform_pose(
 44            jnp.arange(num_clusters.const), *initial_object_poses_prior_params
 45        )
 46        @ "object_poses"
 47    )
 48
 49    # Absolute particle poses in world coordinates
 50    absolute_particle_poses = initial_object_poses[object_assignments].compose(
 51        relative_particle_poses
 52    )
 53
 54    # Initial camera pose in world coordinates
 55    initial_camera_pose = (
 56        uniform_pose_in_ball(*camera_pose_prior_params) @ "initial_camera_pose"
 57    )
 58
 59    # Initial visibility mask
 60    initial_vis_mask = (
 61        b3d.modeling_utils.bernoulli.vmap(in_axes=(0,))(
 62            jnp.repeat(jax.scipy.special.logit(0.5), num_particles.const)
 63        )
 64        @ "initial_visibility"
 65    )
 66
 67    dynamic_state = (initial_object_poses, initial_camera_pose)
 68    static_state = (object_assignments, relative_particle_poses, num_particles)
 69
 70    return (
 71        (dynamic_state, static_state),
 72        {
 73            "relative_particle_poses": relative_particle_poses,
 74            "absolute_particle_poses": absolute_particle_poses,
 75            "object_poses": initial_object_poses,
 76            "camera_pose": initial_camera_pose,
 77            "vis_mask": initial_vis_mask,
 78        },
 79    )
 80
 81
 82@gen
 83def particle_system_state_step(carried_state, _):
 84    dynamic_state, static_state = carried_state
 85    object_poses, camera_pose = dynamic_state
 86    object_assignments, relative_particle_poses, num_particles = static_state
 87
 88    new_object_poses = (
 89        uniform_pose_in_ball.vmap(in_axes=(0, None, None))(object_poses, 0.1, 0.1)
 90        @ "object_poses"
 91    )
 92
 93    # Absolute particle poses in world coordinates
 94    absolute_particle_poses = new_object_poses[object_assignments].compose(
 95        relative_particle_poses
 96    )
 97
 98    # Updated camera pose in world coordinates
 99    new_camera_pose = uniform_pose_in_ball(camera_pose, 0.1, 0.2) @ "camera_pose"
100
101    # Visibility mask
102    vis_mask = (
103        b3d.modeling_utils.bernoulli.vmap(in_axes=(0,))(
104            jnp.repeat(jax.scipy.special.logit(0.5), num_particles.const)
105        )
106        @ "visibility"
107    )
108
109    new_dynamic_state = (new_object_poses, new_camera_pose)
110    new_state = (new_dynamic_state, static_state)
111    return (
112        new_state,
113        {
114            "relative_particle_poses": relative_particle_poses,
115            "absolute_particle_poses": absolute_particle_poses,
116            "object_poses": new_object_poses,
117            "camera_pose": new_camera_pose,
118            "vis_mask": vis_mask,
119        },
120    )
121
122
123@gen
124def latent_particle_model(
125    num_timesteps,  # const object
126    num_particles,  # const object
127    num_clusters,  # const object
128    relative_particle_poses_prior_params,
129    initial_object_poses_prior_params,
130    camera_pose_prior_params,
131):
132    """
133    Retval is a dict with keys "relative_particle_poses", "absolute_particle_poses",
134    "object_poses", "camera_poses", "vis_mask"
135    Leading dimension for each timestep is the batch dimension.
136    """
137    (state0, init_retval) = (
138        initial_particle_system_state(
139            num_particles,
140            num_clusters,
141            relative_particle_poses_prior_params,
142            initial_object_poses_prior_params,
143            camera_pose_prior_params,
144        )
145        @ "state0"
146    )
147
148    final_state, scan_retvals = (
149        particle_system_state_step.scan(n=(num_timesteps.const - 1))(state0, None)
150        @ "states1+"
151    )
152
153    # concatenate each element of init_retval, scan_retvals
154    return jax.tree.map(
155        lambda t1, t2: jnp.concatenate([t1[None, :], t2], axis=0),
156        init_retval,
157        scan_retvals,
158    ), final_state
159
160
161@genjax.gen
162def sparse_observation_model(
163    particle_absolute_poses, camera_pose, visibility, instrinsics, sigma
164):
165    # TODO: add visibility
166    uv = b3d.camera.screen_from_world(
167        particle_absolute_poses.pos, camera_pose, instrinsics.const
168    )
169    uv_ = (
170        b3d.modeling_utils.normal(uv, jnp.tile(sigma, uv.shape)) @ "sensor_coordinates"
171    )
172    return uv_
173
174
175@genjax.gen
176def sparse_gps_model(latent_particle_model_args, obs_model_args):
177    # (b3d.camera.Intrinsics.from_array(jnp.array([1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0])), 0.1)
178    particle_dynamics_summary, final_state = (
179        latent_particle_model(*latent_particle_model_args) @ "particle_dynamics"
180    )
181    obs = (
182        sparse_observation_model.vmap(in_axes=(0, 0, 0, None, None))(
183            particle_dynamics_summary["absolute_particle_poses"],
184            particle_dynamics_summary["camera_pose"],
185            particle_dynamics_summary["vis_mask"],
186            *obs_model_args,
187        )
188        @ "obs"
189    )
190    return (particle_dynamics_summary, final_state, obs)
191
192
193def make_dense_gps_model(likelihood):
194    """
195    The provided likelihood should be a Generative Function with
196    one latent choice at address `"image"`, which accepts `(mesh, other_args)` as input,
197    and outputs `(image, metadata)`.
198    The value `image` should be sampled at `"image"`.
199    """
200
201    @genjax.gen
202    def dense_gps_model(latent_particle_model_args, dense_model_args):
203        particle_dynamics_summary, final_state = (
204            latent_particle_model(*latent_particle_model_args) @ "particle_dynamics"
205        )
206        absolute_particle_poses_last_frame = particle_dynamics_summary[
207            "absolute_particle_poses"
208        ][-1]
209        camera_pose_last_frame = particle_dynamics_summary["camera_pose"][-1]
210        absolute_particle_poses_in_camera_frame = (
211            camera_pose_last_frame.inv() @ absolute_particle_poses_last_frame
212        )
213
214        batched_mesh, likelihood_args = dense_model_args
215        merged_mesh = Mesh.transform_and_merge_meshes(
216            batched_mesh, absolute_particle_poses_in_camera_frame
217        )
218        image = likelihood(merged_mesh, likelihood_args) @ "obs"
219        return (particle_dynamics_summary, final_state, image)
220
221    return dense_gps_model
222
223
224def visualize_particle_system(
225    latent_particle_model_args,
226    particle_dynamics_summary,
227    final_state,
228    *,
229    transform_Viz_Trace=Pose.identity(),  # Transform the trace's world coordinate system to the
230    # coordinate system used by the visualizers
231    viz_prefix="trace",
232):
233    import rerun as rr
234
235    (_dynamic_state, static_state) = final_state
236
237    (
238        num_timesteps,  # const object
239        _num_particles,  # const object
240        num_clusters,  # const object
241        _relative_particle_poses_prior_params,
242        _initial_object_poses_prior_params,
243        _camera_pose_prior_params,
244    ) = latent_particle_model_args
245
246    absolute_particle_poses = particle_dynamics_summary["absolute_particle_poses"]
247    object_poses = particle_dynamics_summary["object_poses"]
248    camera_pose = particle_dynamics_summary["camera_pose"]
249    object_assignments = static_state[0]
250
251    cluster_colors = jnp.array(b3d.distinct_colors(num_clusters.const))
252
253    rr.log(
254        f"{viz_prefix}/3D",
255        rr.Transform3D(
256            translation=transform_Viz_Trace.position, rotation=transform_Viz_Trace.xyzw
257        ),
258    )
259
260    rr.log(
261        f"/{viz_prefix}/3D/camera",
262        rr.Pinhole(
263            resolution=[0.1, 0.1],
264            focal_length=0.1,
265        ),
266        timeless=True,
267    )
268
269    for t in range(num_timesteps.const):
270        rr.set_time_sequence("time", t)
271
272        cam_pose = camera_pose[t]
273        rr.log(
274            f"{viz_prefix}/3D/camera",
275            rr.Transform3D(
276                translation=cam_pose.position,
277                rotation=rr.Quaternion(xyzw=cam_pose.xyzw),
278            ),
279        )
280
281        rr.log(
282            f"{viz_prefix}/3D/absolute_particle_poses",
283            rr.Points3D(
284                absolute_particle_poses[t].pos,
285                colors=cluster_colors[object_assignments],
286            ),
287        )
288
289        for i in range(num_clusters.const):
290            b3d.rr_log_pose(f"{viz_prefix}/3D/cluster/{i}", object_poses[t][i])
291
292
293def particle_2d_pixel_coordinates_to_image(pixel_coords, image_height, image_width):
294    img = jnp.zeros((image_height, image_width))
295    img = img.at[
296        jnp.round(pixel_coords[:, 0]).astype(jnp.int32),
297        jnp.round(pixel_coords[:, 1]).astype(jnp.int32),
298    ].set(jnp.arange(len(pixel_coords)) + 1)
299    return img
300
301
302def visualize_sparse_observation(sparse_model_args, observations):
303    import rerun as rr
304
305    intrinsics = sparse_model_args[0].const
306
307    for t in range(observations.shape[0]):
308        rr.set_time_sequence("time", t)
309        img = particle_2d_pixel_coordinates_to_image(
310            observations[t], intrinsics.height, intrinsics.width
311        )
312        rr.log("obs", rr.DepthImage(img))
313
314
315def visualize_dense_gps(
316    latent_particle_model_args, dense_model_args, particle_dynamics_summary, final_state
317):
318    (
319        num_timesteps,  # const object
320        _num_particles,  # const object
321        _num_clusters,  # const object
322        _relative_particle_poses_prior_params,
323        _initial_object_poses_prior_params,
324        _camera_pose_prior_params,
325    ) = latent_particle_model_args
326    (meshes, _) = dense_model_args
327
328    import rerun as rr
329
330    for i in range(len(meshes)):
331        rr.log(
332            f"/particle_meshes/{i}",
333            rr.Mesh3D(
334                vertex_positions=meshes[i].vertices,
335                triangle_indices=meshes[i].faces,
336                vertex_colors=meshes[i].vertex_attributes,
337            ),
338            timeless=True,
339        )
340
341    for t in range(num_timesteps.const):
342        rr.set_time_sequence("time", t)
343        poses = particle_dynamics_summary["absolute_particle_poses"][t]
344        for i in range(len(meshes)):
345            pose = poses[i]
346            rr.log(
347                f"/particle_meshes/{i}",
348                rr.Transform3D(
349                    translation=pose.position, rotation=rr.Quaternion(xyzw=pose.xyzw)
350                ),
351            )
352
353
354def visualize_dense_observation(observations):
355    import rerun as rr
356
357    # for t in range(observations.shape[0]):
358    #     rr.set_time_sequence("time", t)
359    rr.log("obs", rr.Image(observations[..., :3]), timeless=True)
dummy_mapped_uniform_pose = VmapCombinator(gen_fn=ExactDensityFromCallables(sampler=Closure(dyn_args=(), fn=<function add_dummy_var.<locals>.<lambda>>), logpdf_evaluator=Closure(dyn_args=(), fn=<function add_dummy_var.<locals>.<lambda>>)), in_axes=(0, None, None, None))
uniform_pose_args = (Pose(position=Array([0., 0., 0.], dtype=float32), quaternion=Array([0., 0., 0., 1.], dtype=float32)), 2.0, 0.5)
latent_particle_model = StaticGenerativeFunction(source=Closure(dyn_args=(), fn=<function latent_particle_model>))

Retval is a dict with keys "relative_particle_poses", "absolute_particle_poses", "object_poses", "camera_poses", "vis_mask" Leading dimension for each timestep is the batch dimension.

def make_dense_gps_model(likelihood): 
194def make_dense_gps_model(likelihood):
195    """
196    The provided likelihood should be a Generative Function with
197    one latent choice at address `"image"`, which accepts `(mesh, other_args)` as input,
198    and outputs `(image, metadata)`.
199    The value `image` should be sampled at `"image"`.
200    """
201
202    @genjax.gen
203    def dense_gps_model(latent_particle_model_args, dense_model_args):
204        particle_dynamics_summary, final_state = (
205            latent_particle_model(*latent_particle_model_args) @ "particle_dynamics"
206        )
207        absolute_particle_poses_last_frame = particle_dynamics_summary[
208            "absolute_particle_poses"
209        ][-1]
210        camera_pose_last_frame = particle_dynamics_summary["camera_pose"][-1]
211        absolute_particle_poses_in_camera_frame = (
212            camera_pose_last_frame.inv() @ absolute_particle_poses_last_frame
213        )
214
215        batched_mesh, likelihood_args = dense_model_args
216        merged_mesh = Mesh.transform_and_merge_meshes(
217            batched_mesh, absolute_particle_poses_in_camera_frame
218        )
219        image = likelihood(merged_mesh, likelihood_args) @ "obs"
220        return (particle_dynamics_summary, final_state, image)
221
222    return dense_gps_model

The provided likelihood should be a Generative Function with one latent choice at address "image", which accepts (mesh, other_args) as input, and outputs (image, metadata). The value image should be sampled at "image".

def visualize_particle_system( latent_particle_model_args, particle_dynamics_summary, final_state, *, transform_Viz_Trace=Pose(position=Array([0., 0., 0.], dtype=float32), quaternion=Array([0., 0., 0., 1.], dtype=float32)), viz_prefix='trace'): 
225def visualize_particle_system(
226    latent_particle_model_args,
227    particle_dynamics_summary,
228    final_state,
229    *,
230    transform_Viz_Trace=Pose.identity(),  # Transform the trace's world coordinate system to the
231    # coordinate system used by the visualizers
232    viz_prefix="trace",
233):
234    import rerun as rr
235
236    (_dynamic_state, static_state) = final_state
237
238    (
239        num_timesteps,  # const object
240        _num_particles,  # const object
241        num_clusters,  # const object
242        _relative_particle_poses_prior_params,
243        _initial_object_poses_prior_params,
244        _camera_pose_prior_params,
245    ) = latent_particle_model_args
246
247    absolute_particle_poses = particle_dynamics_summary["absolute_particle_poses"]
248    object_poses = particle_dynamics_summary["object_poses"]
249    camera_pose = particle_dynamics_summary["camera_pose"]
250    object_assignments = static_state[0]
251
252    cluster_colors = jnp.array(b3d.distinct_colors(num_clusters.const))
253
254    rr.log(
255        f"{viz_prefix}/3D",
256        rr.Transform3D(
257            translation=transform_Viz_Trace.position, rotation=transform_Viz_Trace.xyzw
258        ),
259    )
260
261    rr.log(
262        f"/{viz_prefix}/3D/camera",
263        rr.Pinhole(
264            resolution=[0.1, 0.1],
265            focal_length=0.1,
266        ),
267        timeless=True,
268    )
269

272
273        cam_pose = camera_pose[t]

279            ),

283            f"{viz_prefix}/3D/absolute_particle_poses",

286                colors=cluster_colors[object_assignments],
287            ),
288        )

290        for i in range(num_clusters.const):
